info.name: Cricket Spirit API
info.description: Complete API collection for Cricket Spirit Backend - All 4 Phases

request.description: Refresh access token using refresh token
Register current user as a player
Get all players with optional filters
Get all teams of a club
Invite player to team (sends email invitation)
Get all players in a team
Start match (changes status to TOSS, only scorer can do this)
Record toss result (changes status to IN_PROGRESS, only scorer can do this)
Score a no-ball (nb = 1 no-ball + runs scored)
Get current match state (scores, current over, etc.)
